thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 03 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-DAVIDsTEA Says Porchlight Equity Sent Letter To Co Highlighting Concerns With RDI’s Proposal Of Nominees

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-DAVIDsTEA Says Porchlight Equity Sent Letter To Co Highlighting Concerns With RDI’s Proposal Of Nominees

organizations.name: porchlight equity sent letter to co

text:
April 3 (Reuters) - DAVIDsTEA Inc:
* DAVIDSTEA - ON MARCH 28, 2018, PORCHLIGHT EQUITY MANAGEMENT, EDGEPOINT WEALTH MANAGEMENT AND TDM ASSET MANAGEMENT SENT A LETTER TO CO’S BOARD
* DAVIDSTEA SAYS PORCHLIGHT’S LETTER WAS IN RESPONSE TO RDI’S RECENT PROPOSAL OF NOMINEES FOR ELECTION AT DAVIDSTEA’S 2018 ANNUAL MEETING - SEC FILING
* DAVIDSTEA - PORCHLIGHT EQUITY MANAGEMENT, EDGEPOINT WEALTH MANAGEMENT, TDM ASSET MANAGEMENT ARE HOLDERS OF ABOUT 37% OF DTEA’S OUTSTANDING SHARES
* DAVIDSTEA SAYS PORCHLIGHT, EDGEPOINT, TDM HIGHLIGHTED 'SERIOUS CONCERNS' WITH RDI’S CURRENT APPROACH & PROPOSAL IN A LETTER TO BOARD ‍​ Source text: ( bit.ly/2IrqR2r ) Further company coverage:
